title: Superb location. No broker fee. Spacious 2bed/2bath w/parking, laundry
posting_body: No broker fee.
Wellington Condominium
22 9th St, Medford, MA 02155
Move in Date: November 1, 2022.
Ready to move in: comes furnished, with TVs, appliances, etc. (negotiable)
Rent: $3500/mo, yearly contract; first, last month rent and $1000 security deposit required.
Superb location.
Close to routes 16, 28, and 93, 10-minute drive or train ride to downtown Boston from Orange Line Train and bus Wellington Station.
With a "Street Smart” Walk Score of 84, Wellington Circle offers an easy and enjoyable living.
Lots of places for hiking, biking, kayaking, shopping, dining and entertainment.
By moving here, you are not just renting the apartment, you are getting a whole pleasant lifestyle.

Recreation and relaxing: Surrounded by Mystic River Reservation & Marina with green MacDonald Park, Rivergreen park, Gateway Park, Sylvester Baxter Riverfront Park with children’s playgrounds, marina and more.
Shopping areas all around: walking distance to Fellsway plaza, Station Landing, Gateway Center mall, Meadow Glen Plaza, Costco, BJs, Home Depot, Target and of course - Assembly Square.
Supermarkets nearby – Stop & Shop, Aldi, Trader Joe’s, Wegman’s, Market Basket.
Not to mention Starbucks, Dunkin’, 24/7 CVS and many more.
Entertainment: Encore Resort, Station Landing & the vibrant Assembly Square with all the new bars, shops, restaurants, AMC cinema & entertainment they offer.
This spacious second-floor 2 bed/2 full bath condo (1,200 sqft.) is in an 8-story elevator-equipped brick building, windows and balcony facing the beautiful courtyard.
This is the best placement among the surrounding buildings as it provides privacy and quiet environment.
Apartment features washer/dryer in unit, abundance of closets, central HVAC with Nest Thermostat & keyless entry system.
1 assigned parking space, 2 additional spots in outdoor lot plus adjacent visitors parking for guests.

Complex features all freshly updated: new pavement parking lots, video entrance intercom, 2 elevators, renovated common areas, landscaping, in-ground pool with hot tub, recreation area with gas grills and dining patio, exercise room with restrooms, showers and saunas (separate for men and women), 2 tennis courts, fully equipped conference room, club room with pool table and full kitchens, rooftop deck.
Mail can be received and sent out from the 1st floor lobby.
Professionally managed and well maintained complex, management staff on site.
Large living room features flood in-ceiling dimmable lighting, it separates 2 bedrooms which provides privacy, has adjoining sliding doors to finished balcony.
Spacious Master bedroom with wall-mounted TV, ample walk-in closet and full bathroom with brand new shower door, tropical rain shower system, new sink faucet, new quiet vent/heater/light in ceiling.
2nd bedroom is similar in size, also has walk-in closet.
2nd bathroom has washer/dryer laundry center, renovated bathtub, new sink faucet, new shower, new quiet vent/heater/light in ceiling.
Kitchen has open-space design with custom-built bar between kitchen and living room, new pull-out faucet and water filtration system.
Lots of cabinet space.
Utilities: National Grid - electric central air heat pump and energy-smart water heater.
Unit is pre-wired for Verizon FiOS, Xfinity and Netblazr for cable and internet services.
Utilities are responsibility of and paid by the Tenant(s).
Flooring: ceramic, vinyl, carpet (power-washed yearly).

Appliances included: range, dishwasher, over-range microwave/convection oven, refrigerator, 4-slice electronic toaster, programmable pressure cooker, Nespresso coffee machine, in-sink garbage erator, iron, Roomba robot vacuum cleaner, washer/dryer center, energy-smart water heater, 2 smart TVs, Blu-ray/DVD player.
Pets allowed: yes (excluding dogs)
